channel.title: infosec on Martins Blog
channel.description: Recent content in infosec on Martins Blog

item.title: Starting my offensive journey
item.description: As a security engineer in @kiongroup’s cyber defense center I help improving detection capabilities, do incident response, automate security processes and work on security best practices. Besides that I develop software at @main_defense. Although I’m fascinated by the creativity of sophisticated attacks, I feel like I’ve always been on the defender’s side. Time to change that! Today I will start my offensive journey to learn more about the attacker side and how to break things.
